Uses of Class
javafx.scene.control.TableColumn.SortType

  • Packages that use TableColumn.SortType 
    Package Description
    javafx.scene.control
    The JavaFX User Interface Controls (UI Controls or just Controls) are specialized Nodes in the JavaFX Scenegraph especially suited for reuse in many different application contexts.

    • Uses of TableColumn.SortType in javafx.scene.control

      Fields in javafx.scene.control with type parameters of type TableColumn.SortType 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ObjectProperty<TableColumn.SortType> TableColumn.sortType
      Used to state whether this column, if it is part of the TableView.sortOrder ObservableList, should be sorted in ascending or descending order.
